comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Not to be confused with another boxer of that era, Charles "Kid" McCoy. Which was the "Real" McCoy?

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Al McCoy (born "Alexander Rudolph," in Rosenhayn, New Jersey[1], October 23, 1894 – August 22, 1966, in Los Angeles, California) was a boxing world middleweight champion from 1914 to 1917. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al_McCoy_(boxer)
